issue.title: dizipal678.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://dizipal678.com/bolum/konusanlar-2x116](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdizipal678.com%2Fbolum%2Fkonusanlar-2x116) ### Comment > adguard etkin iken ve güncellemeler sürekli yapılıyorken ona rağmen her şeyi filtreliyor fakat video playerın çalışmasını engelleyen video player içine gömülmüş reklamları engelliyor ama video çalışmıyor resimdeki gibi hata veriyor ben video player içindeki başlangıçta çıkan reklamların engellensin istiyorum ama videolarıda izleyebileyim ayrıca reklam geç butonu, sekmesi dahil video playerın içindeki reklamların engellenmesini hatta hiç gözükmemesini ama videoları da rahat bir şekilde izleyebilmek istiyorum bu video player sorunu böyle sitelerin hepsinde var diyebiliriz. teşekkür ederim. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ra0quyan39cw0ck8ko0kwcwwco000cgooxb45osdrk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/dxg4acjmb94wcggo0w4ccwgss4440o8d6dfuurclu8.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.2.240 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode options: | Block WebRTC,

Send Do-Not-Track header,

comment.body:
Fixed an stealth issue, but video is not playing after pressing on play the 2nd time (even without AdGuard, maybe my VPN gets detected).

You have a lot of filters enabled, please disable third-party filters and try again (so only AdGuard's own filters are enabled). With a high amount of enabled filters it can cause various issues.

issue.title: m.fmkorea.com
issue.body:
### 도움이 필요하시면, [filters@adguard.com](mailto:filters@adguard.com) 으로 문의해주세요. > [!IMPORTANT] > [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html)인 경우에는 List-KR 필터와 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에 대한 HTTPS 필터링이 활성화되어있는지 확인해주세요. 또한, 캐시, 쿠키 및 사이트 데이터 삭제 또한 도움이 됩니다. _Google Play 스토어에 있는 [AdGuard Content Blocker](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.android.contentblocker&hl=ko)로는 차단이 어렵습니다._ > [!IMPORTANT] > 또한, AdGuard 유료 라이선스 없이 AdGuard for iOS를 사용하시는 분들은 점점 광고 차단하기 어려워질 수 있으니, 블랙 프라이데이 할인 중인 유니콘 프로보다 싼 [stacksocial.com](https://www.stacksocial.com/sales/adguard-family-plan-lifetime-subscription)에서 구입하신 뒤에 Safari 고급 보호 및 List-KR 필터를 활성화해주세요. --- ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.fmkorea.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.fmkorea.com) ### Comment > 에펨코리아 홈페이지 광고 차단 우회 생겼습니다. 막아주세용ㅠ Username: `@없음` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pj45af2v4hcskokw0s0w8kgs8004s40705yoaypba0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/edoigby682gc8c8kg00ck8sowg0gk8sg6tt88k80c0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.2 System version: | iOS 17.2 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `시스템`, `기본`, `설정`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Language-specific:
List-KR

comment.body:
@hoony0203 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/168573#issuecomment-1858880154
나머지 브라우저에서도 Google Chrome처럼 똑같이 진행해주세요.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/168573#issuecomment-1858883888
저한테도 똑같은 증상이 나타나네요. 잠시만 기다려 주세요.

comment.body:
Issue caused by bug:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1833

This problem will be fixed in the current release cycle, you may want to switch to beta to workaround this problem.
